feature.label: Targetprocess Connector
feature.description: Targetprocess Connector Integration for Targetprocess agile project management software. Targetprocess connector allows you to see all your Bugs, Tasks, User Stories and Requests from Targetprocess ToDo list. You can view and edit your Bugs, Tasks, User Stories and Requests from your ToDo list, attach new files or screenshots, add comments.
